Title: CloudShot
Description: CloudShot is designed to help people all around Internet share screenshots and screen recordings with ease and style.
HomeWiki:
CloudShot

A picture paints a thousand words (c) Frederick R. Barnard

http://cloudshot.com


Features:

- Screenshot of a window or selected region
- Graphic Editor for your shots
- Convenient GIF recording
- Screenshots can be saved to your Dropbox or on the network drive
- Screenshot url/path is automatically copied to the Clipboard
- History of recent shots
- Multiple monitors support
